hero.headline: Live in a Healthy Body
hero.bio: Hi, I am Iryna! An experienced massage therapist and certified Nordic Walking instructor with over 7 years of experience

problem.headline: If You Are Experiencing
problem.subtitle: Your body and mind need help
problem.img_problem_alt: Tired woman experiencing stress and fatigue. Signs of burnout, muscle tension, and exhaustion.

HomePage.solution: Find the perfect wellness plan designed to your body’s needs

service1.name: Massage Therapy
service1.description: Relieve pain, reduce stress, and restore balance with expert massage therapy. Whether you're looking for deep relaxation, pain relief, or posture correction, our tailored treatments—including full body, hot stone, lymphatic drainage, and anti-aging massage—help you feel your best.
service1.img_service_alt: Professional massage therapy for pain relief, stress reduction, and posture correction. Full body, hot stone, lymphatic drainage, and anti-aging massage treatments for deep relaxation and well-being.

service2.name: Personalized Sessions
service2.description: Our personalized posture correction sessions focus on identifying imbalances, improving alignment, and restoring mobility. Using massage therapy and movement-based techniques, we create a tailored plan to help you move pain-free.
service2.img_service_alt: Personalized posture correction sessions to improve alignment, restore mobility, and relieve pain. Tailored massage therapy and movement-based techniques for better posture and pain-free movement.

service3.name: Nordic Walking Groups
service3.description: Improve your posture, strength, and endurance with Nordic walking, a full-body workout that engages 90% of your muscles. This low-impact yet highly effective exercise is perfect for all ages, helping to improve cardiovascular health, burn calories, and enhance joint mobility. Plus, it's a great way to meet new people and enjoy the outdoors.
service3.img_service_alt: Group Nordic walking training for posture improvement, full-body strength, and endurance. Low-impact exercise engaging 90% of muscles, enhancing cardiovascular health, burning calories, and improving joint mobility in a social outdoor setting.

testimonials.headline: Real Stories, Real Results
testimonials.subtitle: Verified by Fresha
testimonials.description: Hear from our clients and discover how our personalized wellness approach has improved their lives
testimonials.review1: Iryna’s massage therapy completely changed how I feel in my body!
testimonials.review2: The Nordic walking sessions are not just fitness—they are community and fun!
